survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about the effectiveness, satisfaction, and areas for improvement in the company's corporate wellness program.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness program?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is visually balanced on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness program?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which components of the wellness program have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation. Ensure checkboxes are touch-friendly for mobile users.

script.question_text: Which components of the wellness program have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness program?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters for readability.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness program?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How has the wellness program impacted your overall well-being?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Very dissatisfied'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Skip logic ensures only relevant respondents answer.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Apply skip logic based on Q1.

script.question_text: How has the wellness program impacted your overall well-being?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Very dissatisfied'.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the wellness program to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Binary with an 'Unsure' option captures neutral responses. Display as radio buttons.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the wellness program to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
